video_prompt: Character walks purposefully, their voluminous hair swaying. The street pavement subtly shifts underfoot. Dappled sunlight on the ground moves and changes, reflecting the shifting leaves overhead. In the distance, another figure walks away, their hair similarly animated.
image_prompt: Anime style digital painting of a young woman with voluminous white and blue curly hair and wide blue eyes, wearing a white sundress with a dark blue ribbon, walking down a sun-dappled street lined with timber-framed buildings and lush green trees with potted pink flowers. Bright and colorful with a painterly quality. Another figure with blue and white hair is visible in the distance.
refined_video_prompt: A character strides purposefully, their voluminous hair vigorously swaying. The street's surface subtly moves and reacts beneath their steps. Dappled sunlight actively dances and alters on the ground, reflecting the rustling leaves overhead. In the distance, another figure recedes, their hair similarly animating.
